definitions.body: a son of Zebulun Ge 46:14, Nu 26:26.
[[אֵילֽן]] Ge 26:34; [[אֵיִלוֹן]] Ge 36:2 a Hittite, father-in-law of Esau.
[[אֵילוֹן]] Ju Jdg 12:11, Jdg 12:12 a judge of Isr., of tribe of Zeb.

definitions.title: 4. n.pr.loc.
definitions.body: [[אֵילוֹן]] Jos 19:43 a town of Dan; so 1Ki 4:9 (where rd. ´[[וּבֵית ח]] ´[[א]] Th Klo).
